title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Advanced Nursing Simulation Collaborative Training

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform simulation training by collaborating with professional nurses in three or more complex patient scenarios.
Learners can document simulation experiences as structured reflective thinking through debriefing.
After simulation training, learners can apply acquired clinical skills in real-world settings with over 80% accuracy for two weeks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
